name: Dllhost Internet Connection
description: Detects Dllhost that communicates with public IP addresses
false_positives: Communication to other corporate systems that use IP addresses from public address spaces
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\dllhost.exe AND network.direction:true) AND (NOT ((destination.ip:(10.* OR 192.168.* OR 172.16.* OR 172.17.* OR 172.18.* OR 172.19.* OR 172.20.* OR 172.21.* OR 172.22.* OR 172.23.* OR 172.24.* OR 172.25.* OR 172.26.* OR 172.27.* OR 172.28.* OR 172.29.* OR 172.30.* OR 172.31.* OR 169.254.* OR 127.*)) OR (destination.ip:(\:\:1* OR 0\:0\:0\:0\:0\:0\:0\:1* OR fe80\:* OR fc* OR fd*)))))`
